languages.text: "В ваших словах столько силы — силы, к которой и мне захотелось примкнуть. Теперь ясно, почему ваши подданные желают за вами идти".

traits.locale_text: "В ваших словах столько силы — силы, к которой и мне захотелось примкнуть. Теперь ясно, почему ваши подданные желают за вами идти".
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "There is so much power in your words — power that makes me want to join you. I understand now why your subjects are eager to follow you."
languages.original_text: "В ваших словах столько силы — силы, к которой и мне захотелось примкнуть. Теперь ясно, почему ваши подданные желают за вами идти".

traits.locale_text: "There is so much power in your words — power that makes me want to join you. I understand now why your subjects are eager to follow you."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "There is so much power in your words — power that makes me want to join you. I understand now why your subjects are eager to follow you."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "There is so much power in your words — power that makes me want to join you. I understand now why your subjects are eager to follow you."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "There is so much power in your words — power that makes me want to join you. I understand now why your subjects are eager to follow you."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “你的话充满了力量，让我情不自禁地想要加入你的行列。现在我明白了，为什么你的臣民们都渴望追随你。”
languages.original_text: "There is so much power in your words — power that makes me want to join you. I understand now why your subjects are eager to follow you."

traits.locale_text: “你的话充满了力量，让我情不自禁地想要加入你的行列。现在我明白了，为什么你的臣民们都渴望追随你。”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: «Sus palabras encierran poder. Un poder que me hace querer acompañarle. Ahora entiendo por qué le siguen sus subordinados».
languages.original_text: "There is so much power in your words — power that makes me want to join you. I understand now why your subjects are eager to follow you."

traits.locale_text: «Sus palabras encierran poder. Un poder que me hace querer acompañarle. Ahora entiendo por qué le siguen sus subordinados».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「{name}様の言葉にはとても力があります…{name}様に協力したくなるような力が。なぜ{name}様の臣下が喜んで従うのか、その理由がわかりました」
languages.original_text: "There is so much power in your words — power that makes me want to join you. I understand now why your subjects are eager to follow you."

traits.locale_text: 「{name}様の言葉にはとても力があります…{name}様に協力したくなるような力が。なぜ{name}様の臣下が喜んで従うのか、その理由がわかりました」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "In Euren Worten liegt große Kraft – ich würde mich Euch gerne anschließen. Ich begreife jetzt, warum Eure Untertanen Euch folgen wollen."
languages.original_text: "There is so much power in your words — power that makes me want to join you. I understand now why your subjects are eager to follow you."

traits.locale_text: "In Euren Worten liegt große Kraft – ich würde mich Euch gerne anschließen. Ich begreife jetzt, warum Eure Untertanen Euch folgen wollen."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « Vos paroles sont pleines de bon sens... et d'une certaine force qui me donne envie de me joindre à vous. Je comprends mieux l'adoration que vous vouent vos sujets. »
languages.original_text: "There is so much power in your words — power that makes me want to join you. I understand now why your subjects are eager to follow you."

traits.locale_text: « Vos paroles sont pleines de bon sens... et d'une certaine force qui me donne envie de me joindre à vous. Je comprends mieux l'adoration que vous vouent vos sujets. »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Sözcüklerinin arkasında büyük bir güç var. Sana katılmak istememi de bu güç sağlamıştı. Tebaanın neden seni böylesine hevesle takip ettiğini anlayabiliyorum."
languages.original_text: "There is so much power in your words — power that makes me want to join you. I understand now why your subjects are eager to follow you."

traits.locale_text: "Sözcüklerinin arkasında büyük bir güç var. Sana katılmak istememi de bu güç sağlamıştı. Tebaalarının neden seni böylesine hevesle takip ettiğini anlayabiliyorum."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion
